https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/21hUS3wuTOJs7kGuUnn49vPevl6.jpg Two men write anonymous love letters to test if their wives are faithful. When their wives actually respond, the two men are left in a fix of what to do. 18 Grams of Love
